â€‹From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Alejandro Agresti (born June 2, 1961 in Buenos Aires) is an Argentine film director and producer. He has become increasingly influential in the United States and directed The Lake House with top Hollywood actors Sandra Bullock and Keanu Reeves in 2006.
